---
id: pix-brcode-parse
title: "Open the BR code information using the emv string."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Open the BR code information using the emv string."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/brcode/parse"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns the PIX static or dynamic BR code information parsed from the emv string.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The QRCode string representation.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for QRCodeParseRequest","description":"","type":"object","properties":{"emv":{"description":"The QRCode emv string.","type":"string"}},"example":{"emv":"string"}},"examples":{"StaticBRCode":{"value":{"emv":"00020126580014br.gov.bcb.pix0136e9df7396-21cc-4e39-b154-77109689646b520400005303986540510.255802BR5913Fulano de Tal6014Rio de Janeiro62130509churrasco6304A5CA"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
